Release LTS.472.10 of December 15, 2025
New Features
The visibility of
main menu items
can now be managed directly through the menu interface.
The metadata flag can now be overridden in the
object type
settings.
For the
On-Premise
solution the dictionary-based translation represented by the system object type is now available, and the translator is now selected through the
system settings
.
Only custom object types are now displayed by default in the “Object type” registry.
The pagination
settings
of registries were expanded.
The settings for
hiding system buttons in the modal window
were implemented.
The
debug mode
was implemented. It allows testing the chart construction based on the object data before integrating it into the object.
The ability to create backlog columns is now available on the
Kanban board
of the extended version.
An ETL transformer for integration with large language models (LLM) through a configurable request was implemented.
The ability to manage access to a folder in the registry was added.
The
integration audit
with external systems was added. It allows tracking execution results of events.
The ability to
set a row limit
returned by the data source when constructing the
OLAP view
was added.
A new mechanism for
authentication in Vault
was implemented.
The ability to export *.docx documents with embedded files as objects was added.
The interface of the electronic document now allows placing user-action buttons.
Changes and Improvements
The loading of application pages in the
SaaS solution
was optimized.
When selecting an attribute for an
expression or autocalculation
, the attributes already used in other expressions and autocalculations are now unavailable.
The process of deleting an instance whose type has a configured
autocalculation
with a link to a child attribute was debugged.
When creating an
index
in an object type, selecting a
child
, custom, or
multiselect attribute
is now disallowed.
The data processing during object profile opening was optimized.
The ability to add instances through the action menu of an object attribute was restored.
The ability to set the table name of the
object type
and the field name for the
attribute
by user was stabilized.
The display of the corresponding registry in the validation error modal window was debugged when creating an instance of other type that violates the uniqueness condition for a configured key.
The display of objects in a child attribute was debugged when changing an attribute with a configured
OnChanged event
.
The data processing during attribute validation checks was improved.
The expressions defining the names of the “Setting up search filters”, “Managing parameters”, and “Setting up to redirect according to the algorithm” types were corrected.
The instances of the type “Action relation to object type” were corrected for the “Find and attach”, “Attach files from PC”, and “Download all files with signatures” actions.
The identifier of the “Download all files with signatures” action was changed.
The header template for instances of the “Notification Template” type - “Start of the replacement. Notification for the replaced employee” was cleared.
The spelling of “AI Assistant” was corrected across all system components.
The “Override the action options” attribute group on the “Action relation to object type” type visual was localized.
The extension for the previously deleted attribute "WF. Activity Flag" [WPT_IS_ACTIVE] in the "WF. Process task" type was removed to stabilize the application startup and build the cache.
The process of adding existing object types to the
subject area
was improved.
The process of deleting an associative relation was improved.
The support for
keyboard shortcuts
was added.
The data loading when opening a registry was optimized.
The automatic update of instances with regard to filtering in the registry was improved.
In the editing settings of
registry columns
, the “Editing in registry allowed” switch is now enabled by default.
The registry update was improved when a
OnChanged event
triggers for a registry displayed on a visual through an
object attribute
.
The ability to select a parent was added when creating a folder in the registry.
The saving of created nested folders in the “Custom filters” registry was improved.
The application of a configured styling algorithm for registries was debugged when switching registries.
The algorithms for MangoOffice were moved into a separate folder in the object profile algorithm registry.
In the
registry edit mode
, the display of column filter buttons was stabilized when multiselect and grouping are enabled.
The placement of search filters in registries was stabilized.
The modal windows of various system modules were optimized.
The icons for system
main menu items
were replaced.
The display of the visual name of an instance after its modification was debugged.
The display of attribute contents of the
“Text”
type with the “Text with complex formatting support” and “Multiline input” visuals is now limited to 4000 characters by default.
The display of objects in an attribute with the
“Multiple objects as a table”
visual was stabilized.
The application of the layout settings for instances of object attributes with the
“Selecting reference values as a button”
visual was debugged.
The operation with the
“Multiple objects as a table (full list)”
object attribute visual was stabilized.
The
start pages
in the base delivery were corrected.
The error notification was improved when attempting to save a
user
with a selected
employee
already linked to another user.
The application of the styling algorithm for registry cells with an
aggregated header
was stabilized.
The display of overridden modal window buttons was debugged.
The process of renaming
attribute groups
, including the use of keyboard shortcuts, was stabilized.
The display of the file attachment button according to the specified position in the
container
cell was debugged.
The opening of the selected tab in a modal window was stabilized.
The duplicate of the “Tasks” main menu item was removed.
The visual of the “Security policy” [SYS_PASSWORD_POLICY] type was corrected.
The ability to scale the executor dropdown list in the
task registry
was added.
The display of the content of the
"Text" widget
and attributes of the
"Text" type
with the "Text with complex formatting support" and "Multiline input" visuals was stabilized.
The settings of the
“Employee information”
widget were improved: the ability to wrap text in displayed data names was added.
The functionality of the widget implemented in the
development environment
was debugged.
The ability to recalculate values in the
“Map point”
widget when changing the address using an algorithm was improved.
The ability to switch displayed registries when selecting child object types in the
“Object registry”
widget was restored.
The operation of stage-visibility algorithms was restored when working with the
"Advanced status bar"
widget.
The “Ok” button was replaced with “Complete task” for
business process
tasks opened in a modal window.
The ability to edit subprocesses from the
main business process flowchart
was restored.
The transition to the next stage was debugged when completing a business process task using an algorithm.
The opening of completed business-process tasks was stabilized.
The ability to suspend the regulatory task deadline was debugged.
The display of the number of periods in the
OLAP
view was stabilized according to the configured settings.
The application of the formatting style and conditional formatting algorithm of a column in the
“Table” analytical dashboard
was improved.
The chart construction time in the
dashboard
was optimized.
The creation of tasks in the
“Kanban Board” analytical dashboard
was stabilized.
The placement of stages and swimlanes in the group was stabilized in the
extended Kanban board
when the group is modified.
The display of the
"Table" analytical dashboard
was debugged when sorting by aggregation fields was applied.
The execution of conditions in value aggregation algorithms was debugged.
The parameter requirements were reworked when configuring the
messenger
function.
The support for using the Null value when adding a chart series in the
universal chart
construction algorithm was restored.
The assignment operator of the “searchOptions” variable in the
objectsWithOptions
function call was fixed.
A confirmation window for installing a ready-made solution from the
Marketplace
was added.
The value selection during configuration of the
condition tree
was optimized.
The operation of
search filters
was stabilized.
The operation of the search field when selecting an extension was debugged.
The operation of the search field was debugged when selecting an extension.
The operation of the SQL-based filter was stabilized when selecting an object through the popup dialog window.
The localization of the name and avatar display of the AI assistant in the chat was fixed.
The import of dates during the
Excel object loading
was stabilized.
The size of image files uploaded into the system using cropping was optimized.
The
User blocking history
now includes data about activation periods, reasons, and blocking activity.
The login for
user authorization
can now be entered without case sensitivity.
Access to the registry and instances of the “User” type is now granted when the “Run”
permission
to “View Metadata” and/or “User Administration” is available.
The display of an error was added when the user lacks permission to view the classification while attempting to upload a file.
The access to the navigation window of a profile for a user without administrative permissions was stabilized.
The ability to log out from the application account is now available to all users.
The permissions of the “All Users” group were corrected to display the configured states of
attribute groups
and the visibility of
main menu items
.
The
“Search by GUID”
was improved.
In the case of an unsuccessful login, the user’s IP address is now displayed in the “Comment” field.
The ability to use templates from the Marketplace is now controlled only through configuration parameters in the
application configuration file
.
The error displayed in the log in case of problems with the license file was corrected.
The export and import of the
reporting form
were stabilized.
The permission check for viewing the computable indicator breakdown was corrected.
The settings of the Analysis of Financial and Economic Activity Module were modernized: the permissions, table names, field names for tables, identifiers, and action visuals for configuring TB and AC file recognition were corrected.
The TB file upload process was debugged.
The comparison of data in a new instance of an embedded template and the display of changes after updating values from sources were stabilized.
The color display of edits made by users working simultaneously with the document was improved.
The processing of styles of text inserted into the document was modernized.
The work with the document was optimized: the tools for commenting and selecting text fragments were improved.
The display of text in table cells was improved.
The loading and application of the specified formatting of the uploaded version from a file were stabilized.
The display of a bookmark in the document marked in the bookmark panel was synchronized.
The insertion of the paragraph sign and the preservation of table boundary positions when a page break occurs were improved.
In the version comparison mode, the link between a bookmark in the document and the survey sheet, and the transition to the object when clicking a bookmark not participating in comparison, were stabilized.
The opening of an uploaded file containing footnotes and a table with merged cells was debugged.
The ability to select the export file format when settings are applied was restored.
The copying of a fragment from a platform document with a specified number of spaces was improved.
The export of a document to the *.pdf format was debugged.
The synchronization of user and access-group data was improved.
For iOS-based devices:
The ability to exchange voice messages was implemented.
The camera operation during a call for Pro-series devices was fixed.
The stability of domain authorization was increased.
The display of the tile registry was improved.
For Android-based devices:
The session recovery and chat operations were accelerated.
The display of the name in the object profile was restored.
The deletion of objects from the child attribute registry was debugged.
The ability to place action buttons in one line was added.
The connection to a
GreenData Meet
meeting is now available without application authorization.
The creation and connection to a meeting in
GreenData Meet
was stabilized.
